sentences: Delegates met in 'informal informal' consultations to consider a revised Co-Chairs' text on additional guidance to the operating entity of the financial mechanism.

Discussions focused on text relating to the provision of GEF resources for country-driven Stage II adaptation activities, particularly the extent to which such activities are based on national communications.
Consultations are set to continue on Thursday.
enb_long_title: Sixth Conference of the Parties to the UN Framework Convention on Climate Change
